name: n8n-nodes-base.trelloTool
semantic_context: Create, change and delete boards and cards

descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Create, change and delete boards and cards
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Get
options.description: Get the data of a list

options.name: Get Cards
options.description: Get all the cards in a list
options.action: Get all cards in a list

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

properties.errorMessage: Not a valid Trello Card URL
Not a valid Trello Card ID

url.name: url
url.description: The URL of the attachment to add
url.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: fields
options.description: Fields to return. Either "all" or a comma-separated list of fields.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

id.name: id
id.description: The ID of the list to update
id.ai_hint: The ID of the list to update

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: idBoard
options.description: ID of a board the list should be moved to

options.name: pos
options.description: The position of the list. top, bottom, or a positive float.

options.name: subscribed
options.description: Whether the acting user is subscribed to the list

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

idMember.name: idMember
idMember.description: The ID of the member to remove from the board
idMember.ai_hint: The ID of the member to remove from the board

type.name: type
type.description: Determines the type of membership the user being added should have
type.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

email.name: email
email.description: The ID of the board to update
email.ai_hint: The ID of the board to update

listId.name: listId
listId.description: The ID of the list to create card in
listId.ai_hint: The ID of the list to create card in

commentId.name: commentId
commentId.description: The ID of the comment to delete
commentId.ai_hint: The ID of the comment to delete

checklistId.name: checklistId
checklistId.description: The ID of the checklist to update
checklistId.ai_hint: The ID of the checklist to update

checkItemId.name: checkItemId
checkItemId.description: The ID of the checklist item to update
checkItemId.ai_hint: The ID of the checklist item to update

properties.errorMessage: Not a valid Trello Board URL
Not a valid Trello Board ID

color.name: color
color.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

archive.name: archive
archive.description: Whether the list should be archived or unarchived

idBoard.name: idBoard
idBoard.description: The ID of the board the list should be created in
idBoard.ai_hint: The ID of the board the list should be created in

conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'attachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'board' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'boardMember' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'card' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'cardComment' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'checklist' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'label' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation IN ["delete", "create", "get", "getAll"] AND resource == 'attachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'cardId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'attachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'url'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'attachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'attachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'attachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'attachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'attachment' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'board' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'board' THEN SHOW parameter 'description'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'board' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation IN ["get", "delete", "update"] AND resource == 'board' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'board' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'board' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'boardMember' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'boardMember' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'boardMember' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'boardMember' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'boardMember' THEN SHOW parameter 'idMember'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'boardMember' THEN SHOW parameter 'type'
IF operation == 'add' AND resource == 'boardMember' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'invite' AND resource == 'boardMember' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'invite' AND resource == 'boardMember' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF operation == 'invite' AND resource == 'boardMember' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'remove' AND resource == 'boardMember' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'remove' AND resource == 'boardMember' THEN SHOW parameter 'idMember'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'card' THEN SHOW parameter 'listId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'card' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'card' THEN SHOW parameter 'description'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'card' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation IN ["get", "delete", "update"] AND resource == 'card' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'card' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'card' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF operation IN ["update", "delete", "create"] AND resource == 'cardComment' THEN SHOW parameter 'cardId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'cardComment' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'cardComment' THEN SHOW parameter 'commentId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'cardComment' THEN SHOW parameter 'commentId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'cardComment' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF operation IN ["delete", "create", "getAll", "deleteCheckItem", "getCheckItem", "updateCheckItem", "completeCheckItems"] AND resource == 'checklist' THEN SHOW parameter 'cardId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'checklist' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'checklist' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'checklist' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'checklist' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'checklist' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'checklist' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'createCheckItem' AND resource == 'checklist' THEN SHOW parameter 'checklistId'
IF operation == 'createCheckItem' AND resource == 'checklist' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'createCheckItem' AND resource == 'checklist' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'deleteCheckItem' AND resource == 'checklist' THEN SHOW parameter 'checkItemId'
IF operation == 'getCheckItem' AND resource == 'checklist' THEN SHOW parameter 'checkItemId'
IF operation == 'getCheckItem' AND resource == 'checklist' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'updateCheckItem' AND resource == 'checklist' THEN SHOW parameter 'checkItemId'
IF operation == 'updateCheckItem' AND resource == 'checklist' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'completedCheckItems' AND resource == 'checklist' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation IN ["create", "getAll"] AND resource == 'label' THEN SHOW parameter 'boardId'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'label' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'label' THEN SHOW parameter 'color'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'label' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'label' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'label' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'label' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation IN ["addLabel", "removeLabel"] AND resource == 'label' THEN SHOW parameter 'cardId'
IF operation == 'addLabel' AND resource == 'label' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'removeLabel' AND resource == 'label' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'label' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'label' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF operation == 'archive' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'archive' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'archive'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'idBoard'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'getCards' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'list' AND operation == 'getCards' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'list' AND operation == 'getCards' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getCards' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'list' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'list' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'list' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
